column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////2nd visit to Bosscat Kitchen for dinner this time. The bourbon whiskey drinks were delicious. For dinner I had the shaved pork & belly sandwich with their homemade slaw. I ordered a side of fries they say take two days to make and they were so delicious. They tasted like a baked potato wedge that was twice fried crunchiness texture with mild seasoning served with a special homemade ketchup. That was so yummy. My husband had this chicken dish over succotash which was equally delicious. We tried the banana pudding for dessert
column2: it was just OK. Overall a nice place to hang out for dinner and we ate outside on the patio and the Â atmosphere was really nice.
